description: This is a startup script for setting up and managing a MongoDB server, including starting the server, checking if it is running, creating users, and configuring environment variables.

methods.name: mongosh
methods.description: MongoDB shell command used to evaluate commands and create users.

methods.name: pkill
methods.description: Terminates processes by name, used here to stop mongod if needed.

methods.name: lsof
methods.description: Lists open files, used here to determine the port MongoDB is listening on.

methods.name: sleep
methods.description: Pauses script execution to wait for server startup or other operations.
